content.html: Infrastructure will never become a priority because infrastructure at its core is a liability. Applications are profit centers. People and technology are investment centers. Infrastructure is a cost center. Your only role in infrastructure is to bleed less and die slower.
content.value:
Infrastructure will never become a priority because infrastructure at its core is a liability. 

Applications are profit centers.
People and technology are investment centers.
Infrastructure is a cost center.

Your only role in infrastructure is to bleed less and die slower.
